DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Qdrant client health check is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint URI string of the Qdrant server to connect to.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the Qdrant health check timeout in milliseconds.

Key.description: The API Key of the Qdrant server to connect to.

Client.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a Qdrant server using QdrantClient.
